verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: that a historic meeting between him and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will take place in Singapore on June 12] .
President Donald Trump announced Thursday that a historic meeting between him and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: will] take place in Singapore on June 12 .
